p: The day silage was uncovered (0 day), the number of enterobacter was found out to be 1.01 log 10 cfu/g at the CON group, whereas it was too low to be determined in CMN3 and CMN5 groups (p<0.05). The level of mould was determined as 2.49 log 10 cfu/g on the control group, while none were found in the treatment groups ( Table 5). Cumin essential oil increased number of LAB according to the dose used (p<0.05) and decreased the number of yeast (p<0.05), however it did not completely prevent their development.
